metadata.title: CVE-2018-12207 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - high
metadata.description:
Improper invalidation for page table updates by a virtual guest operatingsystem for multiple Intel(R) Processors may allow an authenticated user topotentially enable denial of service of the host system via local access.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-12207` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.4.0-1126-raspi2 - 4.4.0-1126.135
No subscription required

linux-image-4.4.0-1130-snapdragon - 4.4.0-1130.138
No subscription required
